subject: [sugar] Project: EduKT - Website and Video
body:
Hello,This is the -provisional- site of EduKT:http://www.cosperu.com/EduKT
In the bottom, you will see a Video demo with a Child creating a content...I will update my XO to the latest jhbuild (run on it) and create 2 more videos:
New version of the "farm" and the "jungle"This will be scheduled for this weekend.By the way, any way of play a simple mp3/ogg on the XO?... the gst library must include codecs for that....
-- --------------------------------Alfonso de la Guarda        ICTEC SAC  www.cosperu.comwww.delaguarda.info
